basics.name: Scott Garland
basics.label: Shidler Undegraduate
basics.summary: I am currently studying to get my BBA in management information systems from the Shidler School of Business. I expect to graduate in 2025.

work.summary: I work as a technician to assist staff and faculty of UH Manoa with any technical problems they may experience. Additionally, while not on tech jobs, I will be answering emails and phone calls directed at the ITS Help Desk.
highlights: Deployment of new computers, Network Troubleshooting, Setting up VPN's, Mapping Network Drives, Printer configuration.

work.summary: Interned at Porsche of Hawaii as part of a school program. Was asked to continue to work through the summer as a paid employee. In this position, I was directly under the lead head technician helping with car repairs, oil changes, shop maintenance, inventory, and providing customer service.
